name: Road Bike Sprint Free
description:
Road Bike Sprint is a 3D fast traffic heat racer game, where you can ride your dream heavy bike at your desired speed, no limits! Drive the most critically acclaimed bike racing game today! Get ready for the most exhilarating handheld racing experience! A tense endless racer to dodge the traffic and deadly obstacles. You have to avoid cars, bus,vans and race as long as you can! Set high records! Compete your friends. Road Bike Sprint is an exciting motorcycle game, you will be riding around whole world facing hard riders with their powerful motorcycles!realistic bike physics effects. Buckle up! you’re in for the ride of the best racing experience. Feel the intensity of no brakes allowed street racing with the best 3D racing visuals. Go ahead with dogging, cars, buses and lite vehicles.
Highlighted Game Features:

>> High-Speed Stunts in an Intense Driving Experience
>> Super Bikes and Stunning Graphics
>> Easily Equitable Game-play Design
>> Go Wild on the Roads!
More Features:
- tilt phone to control car direction
- tap screen to accelerate (boost the speed)
- visually stunning and built for speed
- that is just a game, in real world you should not drive so fast!!
-One wheelie by NOS
